short_summary: Selection was not applicable due to exceptionally advantageous conditions.
description: Advance contract award notice issued for the purchase of a MINI-PORTABLE EMISSIONS MEASUREMENT SYSTEM.
full_summary:
=====================

**Title**
--------

ACAN for Mini-Portable Emissions Measurement System
---------------------------------------------------

### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4065230349-Doc4220027530
* **Publication Date**: September 19, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 5, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 13, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: December 7, 2025

### Solicitation Description

This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) notification for a mini-portable emissions measurement system. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a qualified supplier to provide this system.

### Key Details

* **UNSPSC Code**: 41100000 (Laboratory and scientific equipment)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* **Procurement Method**: Advance contract award notice
* **Trade Agreements**: The Acquisition is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.
* **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Slater Watson
Watson.Slater@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Related Documents

For the complete solicitation package, please visit the following website:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17490338?extsite=MTc0OTAzMzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
